text: "Neither can Nigel," smiled Diana."He's saving up to get married. Remember?" remember, quipped the houseman, meaning no offence,"but does he? That blonde was something.Anybody I know?she smiled.I think so.I got a good look at her. But if Nigel wasn't there it isn't important, is it?No,Di said immediately. "It isn't at all important.
